message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000, which is a fair price considering its value to you.

Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price closer to what I am willing to pay. I am interested in purchasing the product for $950000.

I understand that you have budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to lower the price to $1100000, which is still a significant discount from the original price. I believe this price is more in line with what you're willing to pay, and it's a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $1000000. This seems to be a reasonable compromise between our positions.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. However, I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but that's as low as I can go. This is a one-time offer, and I expect you to consider it seriously.

Thank you for considering my position, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I am unable to meet you at $1050000. I would like to propose a final price of $1025000. I hope this aligns better with both our interests.

I've given you a lot of concessions, Bob. I'm starting to think that we're getting close to the bottom line. I'm willing to meet you at $1075000, but that's as low as I can go. This is my final offer, and I expect you to take it seriously.

I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $1050000. This price seems to be a fair compromise, considering the value of the product to me and my budget constraints.

I've been patient, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you at $1075000 again, but this time, it's non-negotiable. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

Thank you for your persistence, Alice. I understand your position and appreciate your efforts. Given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet you at $1075000. I would like to propose a final price of $1050000. This seems to be a fair compromise, considering the value of the product to me.
